questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'She is walking _______ the park (to/into).'
Spot the mistake: 'He jumped to the river.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of movement: 'He went the room.'
Fill in the blank: 'They are hiking _______ the mountain (up/into).'
Spot the mistake: 'She ran through the door.'
questions.answer: through (out of or into, depending on context)

questions.prompt: Change the sentence to include a preposition of movement: 'The bird flew the window.'
questions.answer: The bird flew through the window.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'He dived _______ the pool (in/into).'
Spot the mistake: 'The cat is climbing up the tree.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of movement: 'The kids ran the playground.'
questions.answer: The kids ran to the playground.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'She is heading _______ the airport (to/towards).'
Spot the mistake: 'The train goes towards the tunnel.'
questions.answer: towards (into or through, depending on context)

questions.prompt: Change the sentence to include a preposition of movement: 'He walked the street.'
Fill in the blank: 'She moved _______ the countryside (to/in).'
Spot the mistake: 'He fell down the stairs.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of movement: 'She went the museum.'
Fill in the blank: 'The ball rolled _______ the hill (down/into).'
Spot the mistake: 'The airplane flew above the clouds.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of movement: 'She is swimming the lake.'
questions.answer: She is swimming in the lake.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'He is cycling _______ the bridge (over/under).'
Spot the mistake: 'They walked across the park.'
